pages.text: $(li)The Furnace is a basic utility block that you can use in the Smeltery process.$(br)$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Furnace and right click in it.

$(li)Now you have to insert the Fuel in the Fuel slot, the most common fuel are Wood, Charcoal, Coal, Coal Blocks, Lava Bucket, Blaze Rod and finally Blaze Lanterns.$(br)$(li)Then you need to place the item to smelt in the Smeletery slot.$(br)$(li)Finally you can pick up the result and add it into your inventory.
$(li)A Furnace can be used to craft a Boat with Furnace, Minecart with Furnace, Blast Furnace, Smoker, Kiln, and a Blast Furnace.
